{{disambig-more: The '''Cambridge Tolkien Society''', also known as the '''Minas Tirith Smial''', is a [[Cambridge]]-based smial of [[The Tolkien Society]]. The smial was founded in [[1983]] by students of the [[wikipedia:University of Cambridge
Minas Tirith: university]], one of them being [[Julian C. Bradfield]]. They publish the journal ''[[Anor (journal)
[[Minas Tirith (disambiguation)]]}}: Anor]]'' twice a year, and hold weekly meetings.
